short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeSnap is a chrome extension that allows you to Create, manage and share beautiful images of your code snippets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeSnap: Transform your code into captivating visual art with the CodeSnap Chrome extension. Effortlessly create, share, and manage beautiful code images, links, and scalable SVGs. Auto code detection for 40+ languages and a rich array of themes and fonts. Elevate your code, inspire collaboration, and share it like never before!
